text: Tiniharu manisaharubata ta lukna sakdachan tara allahabata lukna sakdainan. Jaba yiniharu ratirati apasama ti kuraharubare chalaphala gardachan, jasala'i allahale ruca'umdainan. Tyatikhera pani allaha yiniharuko najika hune gardacha. Allahale yiniharuka sampurna kriyakalapala'i aphno gherama rakheko cha
